original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND c.UserId = u.Id AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 17:46:38' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=11 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 09:46:48' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 10:09:50' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-03 19:42:40' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 02:20:03' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 17:46:38'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-03 19:42:40' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 02:20:03')

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 4 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 11) AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 09:46:48' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 10:09:50')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.Id=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2.Id)
